description: This file handles server-side rendering requests in a Remix framework application, including handling for bots and browsers, managing HTTP headers, and streaming responses.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main entry point to handle HTTP requests, distinguish bot vs. browser, set CORS headers, and route to appropriate handlers.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handle server-side rendering stream for bots, send pre-rendered HTML directly.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handle server-side rendering stream for browsers, send streaming HTML response.
